definition: خول II to grant, accord, give, concede (هـ ه to s.o. s.th., also هـ ل; esp., the right, the power to do s.th.), bestow, confer (هـ ه upon s.o. s.th., also هـ ل), vest, endow (هـ ه s.o. with s.th., also. ل) خول kawal chattels, property, esp., that consisting in livestock and slaves; servants; (eg.) dancer; effeminate person, sissy
